title: The Naked Gun: New Poster Released, Official Trailer Drops Tomorrow
description: Paramount Pictures dropped a new poster for the upcoming remake of The Naked Gun. The official trailer will be released tomorrow.
author: Kaitlyn Booth
excerpt: It might be the middle of June, but that doesn't mean we aren't looking toward the end of the summer in terms of movie releases. August is always such a weird time of the year. While the dead season in January feels like it has more or less fallen by the wayside, August is still [‚Ä¶]
text: Posted in: Movies, Paramount Pictures | Tagged: The Naked GunParamount Pictures dropped a new poster for the upcoming remake of The Naked Gun. The official trailer will be released tomorrow.Article Summary Paramount Pictures unveils a new poster for the upcoming The Naked Gun remake set to launch this summer. The official trailer for The Naked Gun will make its debut tomorrow, raising anticipation for the reboot. August is positioned as a prime release window, with hopes The Naked Gun will be a potential sleeper hit. The Naked Gun remake promises comedic action and arrives in theaters on August 1, 2025. It might be the middle of June, but that doesn't mean we aren't looking toward the end of the summer in terms of movie releases. August is always such a weird time of the year. While the dead season in January feels like it has more or less fallen by the wayside, August is still more or less stuck in the self fulfilling prophecy of "no one goes to the movies, so won't release anything, so no one goes to the movies, so we won't release anything," and so on. This August has some heavy hitters in the wings, but¬†The Naked Gun remake could be one of those sleeper hits if it manages to work. At the end of the summer and after such a busy July, this is looking like the kind of mindless fun everyone could really need. Paramount Pictures dropped a new poster today with the official trailer set to debut tomorrow. ¬© 2025 PARAMOUNT PICTURES. Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father's footsteps in The Naked Gun, directed by Akiva Schaffer (Saturday Night Live, Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping) and from producer Seth MacFarlane (Ted, Family Guy). Joining the case are cast Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, CCH Pounder, Kevin Durand, Cody Rhodes, Liza Koshy, Eddie Yu, with Danny Huston. html:
Posted in: Movies, Paramount Pictures | Tagged: The Naked Gun

Paramount Pictures dropped a new poster for the upcoming remake of The Naked Gun. The official trailer will be released tomorrow.

Article Summary

  • Paramount Pictures unveils a new poster for the upcoming The Naked Gun remake set to launch this summer.
  • The official trailer for The Naked Gun will make its debut tomorrow, raising anticipation for the reboot.
  • August is positioned as a prime release window, with hopes The Naked Gun will be a potential sleeper hit.
  • The Naked Gun remake promises comedic action and arrives in theaters on August 1, 2025.

It might be the middle of June, but that doesn't mean we aren't looking toward the end of the summer in terms of movie releases. August is always such a weird time of the year. While the dead season in January feels like it has more or less fallen by the wayside, August is still more or less stuck in the self fulfilling prophecy of "no one goes to the movies, so won't release anything, so no one goes to the movies, so we won't release anything," and so on. This August has some heavy hitters in the wings, but¬†The Naked Gun remake could be one of those sleeper hits if it manages to work. At the end of the summer and after such a busy July, this is looking like the kind of mindless fun everyone could really need. Paramount Pictures dropped a new poster today with the official trailer set to debut tomorrow.

The Naked Gun: Summary, Cast List, Release Date

Only one man has the particular set of skills‚Ä¶ to lead Police Squad and save the world! Lt. Frank Drebin Jr. (Liam Neeson) follows in his father's footsteps in The Naked Gun, directed by Akiva Schaffer (Saturday Night Live, Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping) and from producer Seth MacFarlane (Ted, Family Guy). Joining the case are cast Pamela Anderson, Paul Walter Hauser, CCH Pounder, Kevin Durand, Cody Rhodes, Liza Koshy, Eddie Yu, with Danny Huston. The Naked Gun will be released in theaters on August 1, 2025.

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

About Kaitlyn Booth

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.

Latest by Kaitlyn Booth

The Naked Gun: New Poster Released, Official Trailer Drops Tomorrow

Paramount Pictures dropped a new poster for the upcoming remake of The Naked Gun. The official trailer will be released tomorrow.

The Batman Part II: James Gunn Says He'll See The Script "Shortly"

Director and writer Matt Reeves hasn't turned in the script for The Batman Part II yet, but James Gunn says they should be seeing it "shortly."

LAIKA's ParaNorman Is Returning To Theaters This October

LAIKA's 2012 underrated masterpiece, ParaNorman, will be remastered and released in theaters this October by Fathom Entertainment.

Elio: The Blooper Reels Are Back Plus A New Image

The Blooper Reels have made their triumphant return, and Pixar released two for the upcoming Elio, plus a new image.

28 Years Later: Narrative Subversion And Praising Danny Boyle

Sony released two more BTS vignettes for 28 Years Later, with writer Alex Garland talking narrative subversion and star Aaron Taylor-Johnson praising director Danny Boyle.

The Legend of Zelda Shifts Its Release Date From March To May 2027

Sony and Nintendo have delayed the live-action adaptation of The Legend of Zelda from March 26, 2027, to May 7, 2027, citing "production reasons."
